name: Cubehex
description:
Welcome to Cubehex! The highly-addicting, Infinite 3D runner!

Dodge the obstacles and stay on the platform! Have fun!

- Why you should play Cubehex -
  • Infinite runner - The game never ends!
  • Physic-simulated movement - Master the physics-simulated movement on the cube
  • Play on the go! - Download on the Google Play Store to play on your Android device on the go!
  • Challenge yourself! - Try beating your highest score whenever you play!
Controls
  • Keyboard - WASD
  • Touch controls / Mobile - Hold the right side of the screen to move right and the left side of the screen to move left

This game will recieve some updates once in a while for more content, so stay tuned for more exciting news!
